name: KandernTrashSchedule
0:
”Alexa, open My Trash Pickup”
”Alexa, ask My Trash Pickup for my schedule”
”Alexa, ask My Trash Pickup for the next paper day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my trash pickup
des: This skill allows Kandern, Germany area residents to ask about up-coming trash pickups. A user can find out the schedule for their village for the next 7 days or query for a particular item (bio, paper, restmull, or gelbes). To switch villages after initial start, the user can open the skill and say, Switch to "name of village".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
